extendedInfo.description: A very simple widget for viewing your files straight from the Home Screen.Features:* Browse through your SD card* ListView or GridView* Open files using your default app* Rename, Copy, Move, Delete and Share filesFeature requests welcome!

reviews.title: Simple
reviews.comment: I am surprised there are no widgets for browsing and launching files.  So happy to have found this, great for launching my videos, movies, pictures quickly.
reviews.author: adam dziekonski

reviews.title: great!
reviews.comment: would love floating option as well as transparency and skinning.   i use it for quick document access while taking notes.  thanks for a great widget.
reviews.author: Andrea Piro

reviews.title: Hide files
reviews.comment: This is an excellent app widget and just what I needed. Just want to request option to hide/show files/folders that begin with \342\200\234.\342\200\234 (example:  .android secure)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: LIKE THIS WIDGET ON MY GNEX
reviews.comment: The background does go back to white after a reboot if you use a custom color. Would love to see more options for skins also and to be able to view bigger thumbnails like in Blackmoon File Browser
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The Awesome Widget
reviews.comment: The list/grid view widget is the main point y i use it, Simple UI, fast to find/open a file, Less is more, love it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome file browser widget!
reviews.comment: Fantastic desktop widget on my Galaxy Tab 2 7.0  I use it more often than the file browsers that have many more features just because it\'s more handy and accessible. The only feature I would like to see is the ability to toggle hidden files.  Most of the time I don\'t want to see them.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bloody good
reviews.comment: It\'s a good file browser and it looks good on my home screen. Keep up the awesome work guys!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: File search and popup/float version maybe?
reviews.author: Li Ha

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: This is a great widget that makes it just so easy to navigate your media files.
reviews.author: Joseph Robinson

reviews.title: Goood app
reviews.comment: Its just what I need
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Totally searching for this!
reviews.comment: I was totally looking for a widget application like this, this application is a saving grace.
reviews.author: ian buenaventura

reviews.title: Requested feature
reviews.comment: Please allow us to select what file manager to open when clicking a link.   I\'d love to have this app work something like es explorer, etc.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: Really made my tab work like a PC!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Thank house
reviews.author: Jason Haas

reviews.title: Would love to play with themes
reviews.comment: But I get a FC when trying to go to settings. And there\'s still no root access.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: One issue...I can\'t open .rmvb video files with my video player. Please fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: excellent!!
reviews.comment: Didn\'t even know this was exactly what I needed until I used it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: YES.
reviews.comment: EXCELLENT WORK, OUTSTANDING! If you are on the fence about this app, look no further!! (Bonus points that you included ICS\'s resizeable widgets!!)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simply Perfect!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been looking for something like this for ages!  Simple, fast and unencumbered file access!  Thank you!   I\'ll gladly pay for this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great idea
reviews.comment: Very nice and handy little app. As a suggestion could you add theme support like transparency and color change in order to suit other widgets? Thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User
